Articles.Content:
Hey all,

I've been playing KSP for about 6 weeks, my son pointed me to a youtube video and I'm hooked. In sandbox mode I've built a few cool stations and some nice landers, done some EVA, havent been past the Mun yet but I'm gonna try that soon. I will post some screen shots ASAP.

Welcome to the forums!

If you ever need to ask questions about gameplay, the subforum for that is here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/15-Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorials

And the official wiki is here: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Main_Page

For me, landing on the Mun was very hard, so if you want a guide for that, there's one here: http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Tutorial:Mun_Landing

I hope you have fun playing kerbal space program.

Thanks for the info! My first Mun landing was successful except that I chose a fuel tank that was too small...I didn't have enough fuel to get back into orbit. I had to build a better lander and go rescue my crew. Landing near (600 meters away) the first lander was very hard for me and I wasted a ton of fuel, but I was able to pull it off. The first lander is still sitting on the Mun!
'Precision' lander (and within 1km counts) is a neat skill to have aquired. Well done. Do you let your son play too, or is it entirely a case of he tells you what you're allowed to play?

Pecan,

my son likes his PS3...He plays those dungeon crawler games. He linked me a Scott Manley vid from youtube and I was totally hooked.

He linked me a Scott Manley vid from youtube and I was totally hooked.

That's how many of us got hooked. Welcome.

That's how many of us got hooked. Welcome.

Thank you!

Good luck, and welcome to the forums!

We have a wonderful community.

Have fun with KSP!

Pecan,

my son likes his PS3...He plays those dungeon crawler games. He linked me a Scott Manley vid from youtube and I was totally hooked.

I love Scott Manley. He's the best KSP vid maker

I think I started playing myself like 1.5y ago or so. Kept some break but now with 0.9 started again playing in Carreer mode as I like that best. Previously have had some mun/minimus trips succesfully and some rendeavouz in mun and earth orbit. I hope those would be just a bit easier. I though installed 2 mods (Kerbal Enginer and Mehjeb 2 or so). I have not tried rendeavouz with them yet, but I think they will help the process.
